ca.islandora.alpaca.http.client

Class StaticTokenRequestInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.islandora.alpaca.http.client.StaticTokenRequestInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.HttpRequestInterceptor

    public class StaticTokenRequestInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.http.HttpRequestInterceptor
    Adds a single authentication header to any request that does not already have at least one authentication header.
